glsa.title: PhpWiki: Arbitrary command execution through XML-RPC
glsa.synopsis: PhpWiki includes PHP XML-RPC code which is vulnerable to arbitrary command execution.

background.p: PhpWiki is an application that creates a web site where anyone can edit the pages through HTML forms.

description.p: Earlier versions of PhpWiki contain an XML-RPC library that improperly handles XML-RPC requests and responses with malformed nested tags.

impact.p: A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject arbitrary PHP script code into eval() statements by sending a specially crafted XML document to PhpWiki.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All PhpWiki users should upgrade to the latest version:
